input.sentences: we decided to have a small fire in our fire pit on our back deck .
everybody was having a great time enjoying each others company .
all of a sudden the wind started picking up .
before anybody could stop at a couple embers flew towards the nearby forest .
unintentionally we had managed to start a forest fire .
output.sentences: A fire so hot no one could stand to be in its presence.
What started of so simple just a few twigs now was hot and complicated.
The wind would adjust the flame occasionally , just a gentle gust.
You could almost hear the wood scream as the fire consumed it .
Heat and distruction was all this flame was capable of.
